item.description: Are your children climbing your walls? Join us for an independant weekly meetup held on wednesdays and/or fridays from 9-12, where your 3-5 year olds can enjoy gymnastics, climbing, arts and crafts, science, songs, storytime, snacktime and more! You drop off the children and they will play and learn with us! Children will meet new friends and improve social skills in a fun and safe environment. This meetup is a great fitness based alternative to daycare! The Meet up will be held on Wednesdays and/or Fridays! Join us for one meetup or come every week! Discounts for multiple weeks. Call the office for more info or to enroll: 617-244-3300

group.name: Bouncing Babies and Tumbling Tots in Newton

item.name: Come Tumble, Turn and Learn for 3 hours...
